TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamedPipeClientStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPipeClientStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class NamedPipeClientStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: 暴露命名管道周围的 ，该管道既支持同步读写操作，也支持异步读写操作。

span.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Named pipes 提供单向或双工管道，用于在管道服务器与一个或多个管道客户端之间进行通信。Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients. 命名管道可用于在本地或通过网络进行进程间通信。Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network. 单个管道名称可由多个 对象共享。A single pipe name can be shared by multiple objects. 任何进程都可以充当命名管道服务器或客户端，也可以同时充当这两者。Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了使用命名管道将字符串从父进程发送到同一计算机上的子进程的方法。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process on the same computer using named pipes. 此示例在父进程中创建一个 对象。This example creates a object in a parent process. 对象具有 的 值。The object has a value of . 服务器随后将等待子进程中的 对象连接到该对象。The server then waits for a object in a child process to connect to it. 在此示例中，两个进程都在同一台计算机上，并且 对象的 值为 。In this example, both processes are on the same computer and the object has a value of . 接下来，父进程将用户提供的字符串发送给子进程。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 此字符串将显示在控制台中。The string is displayed to the console. 此示例适用于连接到服务器进程的客户端进程。This example is for the client process, which connects to the server process. 有关完整的代码示例（包括管道客户端和服务器的代码），请参阅[如何：使用命名管道进行网络进程间通信](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code sample, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Named Pipes for Network Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数的管道方向由 `desiredAccessRights` 参数确定。The pipe direction for this constructor is determined by the `desiredAccessRights` parameter. 如果 `desiredAccessRights` 值，则将 管道方向。If the `desiredAccessRights` value is , the pipe direction will be . 如果 `desiredAccessRights` 的值，则将 管道方向。If the value of `desiredAccessRights` is , the pipe direction will be . 如果 `desiredAccessRights` 的值同时包括 和 ，则将 管道方向。If the value of `desiredAccessRights` includes both and , the pipe direction will be .

summary.span: 连接到等待的服务器。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Connect ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Connect() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 连接到具有无限超时值的等待的服务器。

span.span: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用无限超时值调用 方法。This method calls the method with an infinite time-out value. 此方法等待管道实例变为可用。This method waits for a pipe instance to become available. 可能会在从 对象调用 之前返回，但在 返回之前， 将不会返回。 might return before is called from the object, but will not return until has returned. 在连接 对象之后但在服务器调用 之前写入管道的任何数据都可供服务器在调用 后使用。Any data written to the pipe after a object has connected, but before the server has called , will be available to the server following the call to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了使用命名管道将字符串从父进程发送到子进程的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 此示例在子进程中创建一个 对象，该对象随后连接到本地计算机上的一个管道。This example creates a object in a child process, which then connects to a pipe on the local computer. 服务器示例可在 类中查看。The server example can be seen in the class. 此示例是为 和 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

.method public hidebysig instance void Connect(int32 timeout) cil managed
Public Sub Connect (timeout As Integer)
public: void Connect(int timeout);
member this.Connect : int -> unit

param.name: timeout
param.span: 在连接超时之前等待服务器响应的毫秒数。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.

summary.span: 在指定的超时期间内连接到等待的服务器。

span.span: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等待管道实例变为可用。This method waits for a pipe instance to become available. 可能会在从 调用 之前返回，但在 返回之前， 将不会返回。 might return before is called from the , but will not return until has returned. 将 `timeout` 参数设置为 以指定无限超时值。You set the `timeout` parameter to to specify an infinite time-out value. 在连接 对象之后但在服务器调用 之前写入管道的任何数据都可供服务器在调用 后使用。Any data written to the pipe after a object has connected, but before the server has called , will be available to the server following the call to .

exception.span: 未能在指定的 时期内连接到服务器。

span.span: Could not connect to the server within the specified period.
is less than 0 and not set to .

exception.span: 服务器连接至其他客户端并且超时期间已过期。

span.span: The server is connected to another client and the time-out period has expired.

summary.span: 获取共享同一管道名称的服务器实例的数量。

span.span: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

value.span: 共享同一管道名称的服务器实例的数量。

span.span: The number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回当前 对象具有或连接到的 对象的服务器实例数。This property returns the number of server instances for the object that the current object has a handle to or is connected to. 如果当前 对象尚未连接到命名管道服务器，或者当前管道句柄尚未设置，则此属性将引发 。If the current object has not yet connected to a named pipe server, or if the current pipe handle has not yet been set, this property throws an . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了使用命名管道将字符串从父进程发送到子进程的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 在此示例中，在子进程中创建一个 对象，该对象随后连接到本地计算机上的一个管道。In this example, a object is created in a child process, which then connects to a pipe on the local computer. 服务器示例可在 类中查看。The server example can be seen in the class. 此示例是为 和 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

span.span: The pipe handle has not been set.

exception.span: 当前 对象尚未连接到 对象。

span.span: The current object has not yet connected to a object.

exception.span: 管道已中断或出现 I/O 错误。

span.span: The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred.
The underlying pipe handle is closed.
